Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Cylindrical vase with wide mouth, straight rim and stable base with flat bottom. Paste of an orangey colour. The surface is covered with a pink coating. It has a painted decoration in a reddish coulour, consisting of a wide band situated at the rim, framed by two very thin horizontal lines in black.
